original_text: Yet he restored the money unto his mother; and his mother took two hundred shekels of silver, and gave them to the founder, who made thereof a graven image and a molten image: and they were in the house of Micah.
korean_text: 미가가 그 은을 그의 어머니에게 도로 주었으므로 어머니가 그 은 이백을 가져다 은장색에게 주어 한 신상을 새기고 한 신상을 부어 만들었더니 그 신상이 미가의 집에 있더라

sentences.original_text: Yet he restored the money unto his mother
and his mother took two hundred shekels of silver
and gave them to the founder
who made thereof a graven image
and they were in the house of Micah
